docs.name: MaterialToggleComponent
docs.comment:
material-toggle is a button that can be either ON or OFF. User can tap the toggle button to change the state. Usually you use toggle buttons when you have a single ON/OFF option. If you have multiple options from a set to be checked/unchecked, use material-checkbox instead.

Example usage:

<material-toggle [disabled]="false" [(checked)]="true" label="Click me">
</material-toggle>
